head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BERNARDO, MARIO J.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BERNARDO, MARIO J.

block.p: BERNARDO--Mario J., 73, of Old Tappan, NJ died August 2, 2005. Beloved husband of Adeline for 49 years; devoted father of Robert and Richard; loving ''Grandpa'' of Anthony and dear brother of Anthony. Visitation Thursday, 2-4 & 7-9 at the C.C. Van Emburgh Funeral Home, Ridgewood, NJ. Funeral Mass Friday at 10:00AM at the Church of the Annunciation, Paramus, NJ. Entombment Garden of Memories. Go Jets! www.vanemburgh.com
